answer: any kind is fine to me :)

i had an excellent day today: - i got two 20/20's - mother is taking me to the restaurant for the first time in a while - i went to a presentation of a design school/major (for after high school), and it seems super cool and fancy - i updated the website for the first time in a while and worked a bit on CRBT - my economics teacher told us to fill a cool form about how we felt during school in general and i felt super excited - i got to socialize a bit with people from my classroom and i told funny stuff so i was considered a funny person at that moment
